creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
Vennegoor Marieke wrote:

"I'm missing an overview where I can see what documents needs to be reviewed 
(published or rejected)"
*** Bug 29159 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text:
The duplicate bug 29159 uses a different formulation for this 
enhancement: "compact list of pages to publish/reject for reviewers"

creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
once workflow information is stored as repository nodes, it becomes queryable.
the implementation will have to move the worflow storage backend to jackrabbbit.

The "overview" tab in the admin area allows to filter the document list by
workflow state. If you need more specific functionality, please reopen or add
another bug.
creator: andreas@apache.org
